thread.title: MATE/VALENTINE

author: MATE/VALENTINE
title: MATE/VALENTINE
text:
So thankful for the service you provide your customers.
I had to buy an airline ticket to fly to Europe for a quick family emergency visit. All flights we found online were expensive and with a long layover time. You helped us one that fits out schedule better.
WE bought one - and in about half an hour you called back saying you found a better one, with exactly what we like.
So we ended up canceling the one we just bought half an hour prior and booked a much better one and cheaper. Thank you so much for everything you do. Your help is greatly appreciated.
